data.title: Hall of Fame
data.text:
The Indiana High School Tennis Coaches Association Hall of Fame was established in 1992. Currently, there are 143 members of the Hall of Fame. if you wish to nominate someone click on the nomination form below.

Former Inductees: Click to update your information: HOF UPDATE

2024 Inductee Class

The 32nd annual induction ceremony was held on February 2nd, 2024. The following were inducted into IHSTeCA Hall of Fame:

Elizabeth Steele Schmitt (Carmel)

Brandon Gill (Park Tudor)

Tim Wright (West Lafayette)

Duane Klueh (Indiana State)

Mike Hambrock (Terre Haute South)

Ryan Keckley (SB St Joseph)

2023 Inductee Class

The 31st annual induction ceremony was held on February 3rd, 2023. The following were inducted into IHSTeCA Hall of Fame:

Tom Murphy (Cathedral)

Ashley Davis (Anderson Highland)

Sandy Grogyi (SB Adams)

Kyle Stoffel (FW Carroll)

Kendal Hammel (Columbus North)

Lynda Hinshaw (Tennis Official)

2022 Inductee Class

The 30th annual induction ceremony was held on February 4th, 2022. The following were inducted into IHSTeCA Hall of Fame:

Kevin Burnett (Center Grove)

Katie Martzolf Carroll (North Central)

Rajeev Ram (North Central)

Steve Bender (SB St Joseph)

2021 Inductee Class

The 2021 Induction class was not possible due to COVID related issues as the Hall of Fame ceremony and Indiana State Convention were canceled for 2021.

2020 Inductee Class

The 29th annual induction ceremony was held on February 7th, 2020. The following were inducteed into IHSTeCA Hall of Fame:

David Filer (SB Riley)

Scot Yarbrough (Jasper)

Debby Burton (Center Grove)

Scott Riggle (Columbus N/E, Depauw, UIndy)

Barb Oneal (DeKalb)

David Brents (Pike)

2019 Inductee Class

The 28th annual induction ceremony was held on February 1st, 2019. The following were inducteed into IHSTeCA Hall of Fame:

Julie Beekman Wilmert (Marion)

Kevin Clarkowski (Scecina)

Daryl Whitley (Indianapolis Marshall)

Scott Greer (Bloomington South)

Brenda Walling (Evansville Memorial)

Rick Phillipp (Homestead)

Hall of Fame Members
